entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 12:00 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow late in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:53 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023
